summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1536, for the improvement of a main trunk sewer or drainage district known as the "North Trunk Sewer District" by the construction within said district of a main trunk sewer with certain branches along certain routes and in accordance with certain subdivisions of said routes; under Ordinance No. 16615 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
